Help

Structures like a Collector can be selected and placed by first clicking on the Collector button and then clicking on the Canvas where you whant to place it. If Strucutres get placed near the Player the get connected and and can then be built by the packages the Player sends.

Player

The Player distributes with the use of Energy packtes to the Structures. If the Player has no more Health the game is lost.

Stabilizer

The Stabilizer is the wincon. If the Stabilizer get their health fully filled up the game is won.

Collector

The Collector collects Energy and gives that to the Player. The green fields around the Collector are collectionareas.

Blaster

The Blaster has Energy and Health and can shoots at Creepers in its range.

Emitter

The Emitter emitts Creepers that spread and try to take over the world. An Emitter can't be destoyed.

Creeper

The Creeper can destroy Structures and can make you lose the game if the Player has lost all its Health.
